title: Lamā Cemetery
description: Cemetery site near Lama village, Iran with almost 60 graves dating to the late 2nd-early 1st millennium CE. Most of the graves were destroyed by bulldozing in the area for a road in December 1999.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Lamā Cemetery after Rizvani 2007.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Lamā Cemetery
